content.narrating: Security pulls Sarah over during check-in
After witnessing this woman get pulled to the side for extra screening, you think to yourself the following:

content.thinking: Iâ€™m concerned for my safety. I think it was a good idea just to make sure
I didn't have to do an extra screening. I wonder why they pulled her over.
It was not necessary for them to do that. I feel bad that she has to go through this.

content.narrating:
In this game, Marianne started off as someone who is moderate in assertiveness, curiosity, and awareness toward people from different backgrounds, cultures, and beliefs. 
However, your choices throughout the game led Marianne to have an inquisitive attitude toward Sarah.
You demonstrated appropriate knowledge of Islamic culture yet still continued to ask questions.

In this game, Marianne started off as someone who is moderate in assertiveness, curiosity, and awareness toward people from different backgrounds, cultures, and beliefs. 
However, your choices throughout the game led Marianne to have a disrespectful attitude toward Sarah.
While curious to learn more, your lack of knowledge and assertiveness still came off as rude

In this game, Marianne started off as someone who is moderate in assertiveness, curiosity, and awareness toward people from different backgrounds, cultures, and beliefs. 
However, your choices throughout the game led Marianne to have a xenophobic attitude toward Sarah.
Your lack of awareness and curiosity revealed underlying prejudices you hold toward those of different backgrounds

In this game, Marianne started off as someone who is moderate in assertiveness, curiosity, and awareness toward people from different backgrounds, cultures, and beliefs. 
However, your choices throughout the game led Marianne to have a bigoted attitude toward Sarah.
Despite your knowledge of Islamic culture, your responses showed active mistreatment and disdain toward Sarah.

In this game, Marianne started off as someone who is moderate in assertiveness, curiosity, and awareness toward people from different backgrounds, cultures, and beliefs. 
However, your choices throughout the game led Marianne to have a complacent attitude toward Sarah.
You opted to maintain the status quo, neither insulting nor supporting Sarah through her experience.

In this game, Marianne started off as someone who is moderate in assertiveness, curiosity, and awareness toward people from different backgrounds, cultures, and beliefs. 
However, your choices throughout the game led Marianne to have an open attitude toward Sarah.
Despite a lack of knowledge of Islamic culture, your choices showcased a willingness to learn more

In this game, Marianne started off as someone who is moderate in assertiveness, curiosity, and awareness toward people from different backgrounds, cultures, and beliefs. 
However, your choices throughout the game led Marianne to have a cautious attitude toward Sarah.
You chose not to question Sarah further despite knowing what she was going through possibly in an attempt not to upset her further.

In this game, Marianne started off as someone who is moderate in assertiveness, curiosity, and awareness toward people from different backgrounds, cultures, and beliefs. 
However, your choices throughout the game led Marianne to have a hospitable attitude toward Sarah.
You showcased a desire to learn more about Sarah, help her through her situation, and did so in a way that was respectful.
